# Settings

Routines to initialize the main module, print results, plots, and external functions. We can distinguish four folders:
   * self (main struct variable),
   * general functions,
   * display functions,
   * external functions.

```{toctree}
    :caption: 'Contents:'
    :maxdepth: 2

self
```

***

```{eval-rst}
.. collapse:: Routines

   .. automodule:: src.settings.self
      :members:
```
